channel.title: How to use different python version (v3.7) for actionrunner? "python_binary" no longer working
channel.description:
Hi,
till now we used the "python_binary" config setting in the actionrunner section to use a different python binary for action packs. This works fine till Stackstorm 3.4 and is no longer working in version 3.5
If I try to execute my action in version 3.5, I get this error: ``` Traceback (most recent call last): File "/opt/stackstorm/st2/lib/python3.6/site-packages/python_runner/python_action_wrapper.py", line 35, in <module> import orjson ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'orjson' ```

item.title: How to use different python version (v3.7) for actionrunner? "python_binary" no longer working
item.dc:creator: wingi
item.description:
Hi,

till now we used the “python_binary” config setting in the actionrunner section to use a different python binary for action packs. This works fine till Stackstorm 3.4 and is no longer working in version 3.5

If I try to execute my action in version 3.5, I get this error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stackstorm/st2/lib/python3.6/site-packages/python_runner/python_action_wrapper.py", line 35, in <module>
    import orjson
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'orjson'

Read full topic
item.source: How to use different python version (v3.7) for actionrunner? "python_binary" no longer working
